scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && poetry run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.install:all: cd backend && poetry install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test:all: cd backend && poetry run pytest && cd ../frontend && npm run test
scripts.lint:all: cd backend && poetry run black . && poetry run isort . && poetry run ruff check . && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.type-check:all: cd backend && poetry run mypy . && cd ../frontend && npm run type-check
scripts.fix:all: cd backend && poetry run black . && poetry run isort . && cd ../frontend && npm run lint:fix && npm run format
